title: Please help...
body: I didn't know that I couldn't uninstall the new beta client forcefully and did it. When i try to reinstall it, it won't let me. Is there a way to get my beta client back?

replies.body:
In order to reinstall the Beta Client, you'll have to complete a clean reinstallation of the League Client entirely. I recommend following our guide [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) in order to perform this properly.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you for the link! I reinstalled (clean) League and now the beta client is working!
